mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAME_USER( USER_ID, OPEN_ID, USER_NAME, USER_IMG, GENDER, MONEY, USER_AGREE, LOGIN_STATUS, SIGN_UP_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, CID, IP ) VALUES ( #{userId},#{openId},#{userName},#{userImg},#{gender}, #{money},#{userAgree},#{loginStatus}, #{signUpTime},#{lastLoginTime},#{cId},#{ip} )
mapper.update: UPDATE GAME_USER SET USER_ID = #{userId}, OPEN_ID = #{openId}, MONEY = #{money}, USER_AGREE = #{userAgree}, LOGIN_STATUS = #{loginStatus}, SIGN_UP_TIME = #{signUpTime}, IP = #{ip}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime} WHERE ID = #{id}
update GAME_USER set MONEY=#{money} where USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userId, OPEN_ID AS openId, USER_NAME AS userName, USER_IMG AS userImg, GENDER AS gender, MONEY AS money, USER_AGREE AS userAgree FROM `GAME_USER` WHERE OPEN_ID = #{openId} and CID = #{cid}
SELECT ID FROM GAME_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
select CONTENT from GAME_NOTICE where TYPE = 1
select CREATE_TIME as createTime, CONTENT as content, USER_ID as userId from GAME_SYSTEM_MESSAGE limit #{start},#{limit}
select CONTENT_US from GAME_SYSTEM_MESSAGE where STATE = 1
select MONEY from GAME_USER where USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.update: update GAME_USER set LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime},IP = #{ip} where OPEN_ID = #{openId}
mapper.select: select IP from GAME_USER where USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.update: update GAME_USER set USER_NAME = #{userName},USER_IMG = #{userImg},GENDER = #{gender} where USER_ID = #{userId}
